page.title: 13RUDGWICK VILLAGE-CHANGES (2)
page.content: {BUILDINGS}and{LANDSCAPES}have altered in{FUNCTION & APPEARANCE:_ (1) HOUSING {ESTATES}branch off{CHURCH ST.}on form- er{FIELDS & WOODLAND; (2)}a{TELEPHONE {EXCHANGE}&{GARAGE}now occupy the site of a former{RIFLE RANGE; (3)}an{OFFICE for a{METAL STOCKBROKER CO.}and an{AN- {TIQUE SHOP}now occupy former{POST OFF- {ICES; (4)}a large{RESIDENTIAL PREMISES was once a{SANITORIUM}for{PATIENTS}ill with{TUBERCULOSIS; (5)}a{HOTEL}(THE MARTLETS) is now the site for a{PARADE of{SHOPS}whilst a{GROCERY SHOP}once owned by an established village family is now a{HAIRDRESSING SALON. (6)}land adjacent to the{QUEENS HEAD PUB}is now used for{CARPARKING,}but once it had a {TEAROOM}and stopping point for{BUSES;} {(7)}land to the{REAR}of the{PUB}which} now has{HOUSING}was once the site of a {CRICKET PITCH;}opposite is a{GREENGRO- {CERS}stall - formerly a{BLACKSMITHS.
